data.eml:eml: Two new, brachypterous Limnellia species from the Venezuelan Andes (Diptera: Ephydridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Costa, Daniel N. R., Savaris, Marcoandre, Marinoni, Luciane, Mathis, Wayne N. (2016): Two new, brachypterous Limnellia species from the Venezuelan Andes (Diptera: Ephydridae). Zootaxa 4144 (3): 301-315, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4144.3.1
